hero.description: The only platform where data scientists, ML engineers, and operations teams work together—from raw images to production models.

enterprise.title: Built for teams that can't afford to fail
enterprise.description: Security, compliance, and reliability that enterprise teams demand.

api.title: API-First
api.description: Full REST API and Python SDK

scale.title: Infinite Scale
scale.description: Handle millions of images without breaking

cta.title: Ready to ship Vision AI faster?
cta.description: Free trial, no credit card. See how it works on your own data.

hero.description: Aggregate, organize, and explore billions of images from any source. One unified repository for all your computer vision data.

architecture.title: How it works under the hood
architecture.description: Connects to S3, GCP, or Azure. Ingests any image or video format. Indexes everything so you can query it later.

formatSupport.title: Universal Format Support
formatSupport.description: Ingest any visual data type at constant speed

querying.title: Powerful Data Querying
querying.description: Query your datalake programmatically with the Python SDK. Filter by tags, metadata, and more with full type hints and auto-completion.

visualSearch.title: Find similar images instantly
visualSearch.description: OpenCLIP embeddings turn your images into vectors. Search by similarity, cluster by content, and spot outliers without writing a single query.
visualSearch.fineTuneDescription: Generic embeddings not cutting it? Fine-tune a CLIP model on your own data. Search and clustering get much better when the model knows your domain.

organization.title: DataTags & Metadata Schema
organization.description: Multi-dimensional organization with flexible tagging and comprehensive metadata support. Structure your data without moving files.

cta.title: Ready to centralize your data?
cta.description: Connect your storage, upload your data, and start querying. Free trial, no credit card.

hero.description: Git for your computer vision data. Track changes, compare versions, and ensure every experiment is reproducible.

versionControl.title: Track every change, reproduce any result
versionControl.description: Your datasets evolve constantly—new images, corrected labels, filtered samples. Without version control, you're flying blind.

snapshots.title: Immutable snapshots
snapshots.description: Every dataset version is a permanent snapshot. Reference exact data states in experiments.

labelManagement.title: Label management
labelManagement.description: Create, rename, and merge labels across your dataset. Keep your taxonomy clean and consistent.

fork.title: Fork for experiments
fork.description: Fork dataset versions to test hypotheses without affecting production data.

auditHistory.title: Audit-ready history
auditHistory.description: Complete changelog with who changed what, when, and why. Perfect for compliance.

capabilities.title: Everything you need to manage datasets
capabilities.description: Version, organize, and share your datasets. Everything connects to your experiments.

versioning.title: Git-like Version Control
versioning.description: Track every change to your datasets. Compare versions, rollback mistakes, and branch for experiments. Full lineage from raw data to trained models.

organization.title: Smart Data Organization
organization.description: Tag, filter, and slice your data in seconds. Create custom views, save queries, and share collections. No more hunting through folders.

collaboration.title: Team Collaboration
collaboration.description: Share datasets across teams with fine-grained permissions. Track who changed what, when, and why. Comments and reviews built-in.

traceability.title: Full Data Lineage
traceability.tagline: Know where your data comes from
traceability.description: Trace any prediction back to its training data. Audit-ready lineage for compliance. Understand model behavior through data.

sdk.title: Programmatic dataset management
sdk.description: Full Python SDK with type hints, auto-completion, and comprehensive documentation. Integrate datasets directly into your ML pipelines.

dataOrganization.title: Structure your data the right way
dataOrganization.description: Proper data splits are crucial for model performance. Create reproducible train/val/test splits, stratify by class, and ensure no data leakage.
features: Automatic stratified splits by class distribution
Custom split ratios with reproducible seeds

workflowIntegration.title: Fits into your existing workflow
workflowIntegration.description: Datasets connect directly to annotations, experiments, and deployments. No manual handoffs.

cta.title: Ready to version your datasets?
cta.description: Free trial, no credit card. Start versioning your datasets today.

hero.description: Turn your data into annotated datasets with precision and speed. Support for bounding boxes, polygons, segmentation, keypoints, and more.

annotationTypes.title: Every shape you need
annotationTypes.description: From simple bounding boxes to complex polygon masks, annotate any type of visual data with precision tools built for computer vision.

tooling.title: Built for speed and precision
tooling.description: Keyboard shortcuts, smart selection, and intuitive controls designed to maximize annotation throughput.

scrollToZoom.title: Scroll to Zoom
scrollToZoom.description: Use scroll wheel to zoom in/out. Press spacebar to drag and pan around the canvas.

assetGallery.title: Asset Gallery
assetGallery.description: Browse your dataset queue at the bottom. Navigate with O/P keys or click thumbnails.

groupSelection.title: Group Selection
groupSelection.description: Draw rectangle to select multiple shapes. Select by label for batch operations.

aiAssisted.title: 10x your labeling with AI
aiAssisted.description: Use SAM, DINOv2, and Grounding DINO for pre-labeling. Run automated processings to speed up annotation.

sam.name: Segment Anything Model
sam.description: One-click segmentation for any object. Point, box, or text prompts generate precise masks instantly.

dinov2.name: DINOv2
dinov2.description: Self-supervised visual features for similarity search, clustering, and transfer learning without labels.

preAnnotation.title: Pre-Annotation
preAnnotation.description: Auto-generate initial labels using your trained models

autoAnnotation.title: Auto-Annotation
autoAnnotation.description: Fully automated annotation with confidence thresholds

dataAugmentation.title: Data Augmentation
dataAugmentation.description: Expand datasets with transforms and variations

autoTagging.title: Auto-Tagging
autoTagging.description: Automatically tag data in your datalake

qualityControl.title: Built-in review workflow
qualityControl.description: Every annotation goes through a structured review process. Accept, reject, or send back for revision with full traceability.

autoLock.title: Auto-lock on review
autoLock.description: Reviewed annotations are automatically locked to prevent accidental modifications.

returnToEdit.title: Return to edit mode
returnToEdit.description: Clear review status to unlock and continue editing when needed.

fullTraceability.title: Full traceability
fullTraceability.description: Track who annotated what and when with complete audit history.

cta.title: Ready to accelerate labeling?
cta.description: Start annotating with AI-assisted tools and built-in review workflows. Free trial, no credit card.

hero.description: Orchestrate annotation workflows with multi-step pipelines, team management, and quality control. Add annotators, set sample rates, and track progress.

workflows.title: Custom multi-step pipelines
workflows.description: Design annotation workflows that match your quality requirements. Chain annotation and review steps with configurable sample rates.

annotationSteps.title: Annotation Steps
annotationSteps.description: Workers create initial annotations on assigned assets

reviewSteps.title: Review Steps
reviewSteps.description: Team members validate and accept/reject previous work

sampleRates.title: Sample Rates
sampleRates.description: Control what percentage of assets proceed to each step

taskManagement.title: Full visibility on progress
taskManagement.description: Track every task through its lifecycle. Reassign work, manage priorities, and ensure nothing falls through the cracks.

teamManagement.title: Scale with external teams
teamManagement.description: Onboard external annotators quickly with clear guidelines. Control access, distribute work evenly, and maintain quality standards.

qualityControl.title: Collaborative issue tracking
qualityControl.description: Flag problems, discuss solutions, and ensure quality before assets leave the pipeline. No asset can be marked done with open issues.

zoneIssues.title: Zone Issues
zoneIssues.description: Flag specific areas with rectangular markers. Perfect for pointing out boundary errors, missing annotations, or unclear regions.

imageIssues.title: Image Issues
imageIssues.description: Flag concerns about the entire asset. Use for classification errors, image quality problems, or incorrect labeling approach.

qualityControl.blockingRule: Assets cannot be marked Done with open issues

analytics.title: Real-time performance insights
analytics.description: Track time spent, monitor productivity, and identify bottlenecks. See where work slows down and fix it.

avgTimePerAsset.title: Avg. Time per Asset
avgTimePerAsset.description: Detailed time tracking for each task

cta.title: Ready to scale your annotation?
cta.description: Set up multi-step annotation workflows with built-in review and quality control. Free trial, no credit card.

hero.description: From no-code training to custom PyTorch pipelines. Choose your level of control and let Picsellia handle the infrastructure.

trainingModes.title: Choose your level of control
trainingModes.description: Start with no-code for quick iterations, use the SDK for automation, or build fully custom pipelines when you need complete control.

noCode.title: No-Code Training
noCode.description: Launch training jobs directly from the UI. Select a pre-built pipeline, configure parameters, and start training.

sdk.title: Python SDK
sdk.description: Full programmatic control with our Python SDK. Integrate into your existing workflows and CI/CD pipelines.

custom.title: Custom Pipelines
custom.description: Build custom training pipelines with CV Engine. Modular steps, any framework, full flexibility.

preBuiltPipelines.title: Production-grade models, ready to train
preBuiltPipelines.description: Start training in minutes with our pre-built pipelines. Ultralytics for YOLO, SAM2 for segmentation, Grounding DINO for zero-shot detection, and more.

ultralytics.name: Ultralytics
ultralytics.description: Train YOLOv8/v11 models for detection, segmentation, and classification

sam2.name: SAM2
sam2.description: Segment Anything Model for automatic mask generation and refinement

groundingDino.name: Grounding DINO
groundingDino.description: Open-set object detection with text prompts for zero-shot labeling

clip.name: CLIP
clip.description: Fine-tune embeddings for domain-specific similarity search

cvEngine.title: Build custom pipelines with ease
cvEngine.description: Picsellia CV Engine is a modular toolkit for building computer vision workflows. Composable steps, framework extensions, and CLI automation.

modularSteps.title: Modular Steps
modularSteps.description: Build pipelines from reusable, composable steps with @step decorators

frameworkExtensions.title: Framework Extensions
frameworkExtensions.description: Pre-built integrations for Ultralytics, SAM2, CLIP, and more

localRemote.title: Local & Remote
localRemote.description: Test locally, deploy to Picsellia cloud with one command

autoLogging.title: Auto Logging
autoLogging.description: Metrics, artifacts, and parameters logged automatically

infrastructure.title: Zero infrastructure to manage
infrastructure.description: Focus on your models, not your servers. Picsellia handles GPU provisioning, environment setup, and job orchestration. Just click train.
infrastructure.payPerUse: Pay only for what you use

workflow.title: Connected to your entire workflow
workflow.description: AI Lab connects directly to datasets, experiment tracking, and model deployment. Full lineage from data to production.

cta.title: Ready to train your models?
cta.description: Start with no-code training or build custom pipelines. Zero infrastructure to manage.

hero.description: Full reproducibility with metrics, parameters, and artifacts. Compare runs, collaborate with your team, and version models automatically.

logging.title: Log everything, miss nothing
logging.description: Capture metrics, parameters, artifacts, and evaluations with a simple API. Full lineage tracking with minimal integration code.

modelExport.title: Model Export
modelExport.description: Push to model registry with one call

compare.title: Compare trainings instantly
compare.description: See the exact training distribution, hyperparameters, and augmentations behind every performance change. Find your best model faster.

cvEngine.title: Build training pipelines with ease
cvEngine.description: Picsellia CV Engine is a modular toolkit for constructing computer vision workflows. Composable steps, framework extensions, and CLI automation.

trainingPipelines.title: Training Pipelines
trainingPipelines.description: Data → Model → Results. Streamlined training processes with built-in logic.

processingPipelines.title: Processing Pipelines
processingPipelines.description: Dataset transformation, pre-annotation, and data cleaning operations.

frameworkExtensions.title: Framework Extensions
frameworkExtensions.description: Pluggable architecture supporting multiple training libraries.

modelRegistry.title: Version your models automatically
modelRegistry.description: Export experiments to the model registry with a single call. Track versions, compare performance, and deploy with confidence.

evaluation.title: COCO metrics built-in
evaluation.description: Add predictions, compare against ground truth, and compute standard evaluation metrics automatically.
evaluation.supportsFormats: Supports rectangles, polygons, classifications, and keypoints

cta.title: Ready to track your experiments?
cta.description: Start logging metrics, comparing runs, and shipping better models with full reproducibility.

hero.description: Continuous Training and Continuous Deployment. Close the feedback loop, automate retraining, and deploy with confidence using shadow models.

feedbackLoop.title: Production data becomes training data
feedbackLoop.description: Connect your deployment to your training pipeline. Reviewed predictions automatically flow into your training datasets, creating a continuous improvement cycle.

enrich.title: Enrich datasets
enrich.description: Add reviewed data to training sets

trainingOrchestration.title: Automated retraining on your terms
trainingOrchestration.description: Define triggers based on review thresholds, drift detection, or schedules. When conditions are met, Picsellia automatically provisions GPUs and launches training.

reviewThreshold.name: Review Threshold
reviewThreshold.description: Trigger retraining when reviewed predictions reach threshold

driftAlert.name: Drift Alert
driftAlert.description: Trigger when distribution drift exceeds threshold

scheduled.name: Scheduled
scheduled.description: Retrain on a fixed schedule (weekly, monthly)

shadowDeployment.title: Deploy with confidence
shadowDeployment.description: Test new models in production without risk. Shadow models run alongside your primary model, comparing performance on real traffic before you promote.

step1.title: Deploy shadow model
step1.description: New model version runs in parallel, processing the same inputs as production

step2.title: Compare predictions
step2.description: Both models make predictions, but only primary results are returned to users

step3.title: Promote when ready
step3.description: Once shadow outperforms primary, promote it with a single command

endToEnd.title: The complete automation stack
endToEnd.description: From data collection to model deployment, every step is connected and automated. Full lineage, full visibility.

continuousTraining.title: Continuous Training
continuousTraining.description: Automatic retraining triggered by review thresholds or drift detection

continuousDeployment.title: Continuous Deployment
continuousDeployment.description: Safe model promotion with shadow deployment and automated policies

fullObservability.title: Full Observability
fullObservability.description: Monitor every prediction, track every metric, trace every decision

cta.title: Ready to automate your ML lifecycle?
cta.description: Set up continuous training and deployment in minutes. Let your models improve themselves.

modelDeployment.title: Model Deployment
modelDeployment.description: Deploy models to cloud or edge. Auto-scaling serverless infrastructure with 99.9% uptime.

hero.description: Real-time observability for computer vision models. Detect anomalies, track drift, and close the feedback loop automatically.

anomalyDetection.title: Catch failures before users do
anomalyDetection.description: Automatic 24/7 monitoring flags anomalous inputs and low-confidence predictions. Reveal blindspots and discover edge cases in production data.

lowConfidence.title: Low Confidence Alerts
lowConfidence.description: Flag predictions below confidence thresholds automatically

distributionShift.title: Distribution Shift
distributionShift.description: Detect when production data drifts from training data

novelPatterns.title: Novel Patterns
novelPatterns.description: Discover previously unseen data patterns and edge cases

liveDashboard.title: Real-time prediction insights
liveDashboard.description: Filter millions of inferences to identify the top anomalies. From edge case detection to training dataset integration in seconds.

driftDetection.title: Track distribution changes
driftDetection.description: Compare production data against your training baseline. Get alerted when distributions shift beyond acceptable thresholds.

continuousImprovement.title: Close the feedback loop
continuousImprovement.description: Convert production failures into training data. Review predictions, attach to datasets, and trigger retraining automatically.

continuousTraining.title: Continuous Training
continuousTraining.description: Automatically trigger retraining when prediction review thresholds are met. Keep models fresh with production data.

continuousDeployment.title: Continuous Deployment
continuousDeployment.description: Manage model promotion policies between staging and production. Shadow model support for A/B testing.

cta.title: Ready to monitor your models?
cta.description: Start detecting anomalies, tracking drift, and improving models with production feedback.
